original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā āḷaviyaṁ viharati aggāḷave cetiye.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā āḷaviyam viharati aggāḷave cetiye

original: Tena kho pana samayena upāsakā ārāmaṁ āgacchanti dhammassavanāya.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena upāsakāḥ ārāmam āgacchanti dhammassavanāya

original: Dhamme bhāsite therā bhikkhū yathāvihāraṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: dhamme bhāsite therāḥ bhikkhū yathāvihāram gacchanti

original: Navakā bhikkhū tattheva upaṭṭhānasālāyaṁ upāsakehi saddhiṁ muṭṭhassatī, asampajānā, naggā, vikūjamānā, kākacchamānā seyyaṁ kappenti.
analyzed: navakāḥ bhikkhū tattha eva upaṭṭhāna sālāyam upāsakehi saddhim muṭṭha ssatī asampajānāḥ naggāḥ vikūjamānā kākacchamānā seyyam kappenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhadantā muṭṭhassatī asampajānā naggā vikūjamānā kākacchamānā seyyaṁ kappessantī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhadantā muṭṭha ssatī asampajānā naggā vikūjamānā kākacchamānā seyyam kappessanti iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ upāsakānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tesam upāsakānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti
katham hi nāma bhikkhū an upasampannena sahaseyyam kappessanti iti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū te navake bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū te navake bhikkhū aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū anupasampannena sahaseyyaṁ kappentī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhū an upasampannena sahaseyyam kappenti iti

original: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā anupasampannena sahaseyyaṁ kappessanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma te bhikkhave moghapurisāḥ an upasampannena sahaseyyam kappessanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannena sahaseyyaṁ kappeyya pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu an upasampannena sahaseyyam kappeyya pācittiyan ti

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Atha kho bhagavā āḷaviyaṁ yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena kosambī tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān āḷaviyam yathābhirantam viharitvā yena kosambī tena cārikam pakkāmi

original: Anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena kosambī tadavasari. Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati badarikārāme.
analyzed: anupubbena cārikam caramānaḥ yena kosambī tat avasari tatra sudam bhagavā kosambiyam viharati badarikārāme

original: “bhagavatā, āvuso rāhula, sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ—‘na anupasampannena sahaseyyā kappetabbā’ti.
analyzed: bhagavatā āvuso rāhula sikkhāpadam an upasampannena saha seyyā kappetabbā ati

original: Atha kho āyasmā rāhulo seyyaṁ alabhamāno vaccakuṭiyā seyyaṁ kappesi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā rāhulaḥ seyyam a labhamānaḥ vacca kuṭiyā seyyam kappesi

original: Atha kho bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ paccuṭṭhāya yena vaccakuṭi tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ukkāsi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā rattiyā paccūsa samayam paccuṭṭhāya yena vacca kuṭi tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā ukkā asi
kissa tva rāhulaḥ idha nisinnaḥ asi iti

original: Atha kho āyasmā rāhulo bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā rāhulaḥ bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesi

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi
anujānāmi bhikkhave an upasampannena dirattatirattam sahaseyyam kappetu

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannena uttaridirattatirattaṁ sahaseyyaṁ kappeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu an upasampannena uttari diratta tirattam sahaseyyam kappeyya pācittiyan ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti
sabba channā sabba paricchannā yebhuyyena channā yebhuyyena paricchannā

original: catutthe divase atthaṅgate sūriye, anupasampanne nipanne, bhikkhu nipajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: catutthe divase atthaṅgate sūriye anupasampanne nipanne bhikkhu nipajjati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Bhikkhu nipanne, anupasampanno nipajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: bhikkhu nipanne anupasampannaḥ nipajjati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Anupasampanne anupasampannasaññī uttaridirattatirattaṁ sahaseyyaṁ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: an upasampanne an upasampanna saññī uttari diratta tirattam sahaseyyam kappeti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Anupasampanne vematiko uttaridirattatirattaṁ sahaseyyaṁ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: an upasampanne vematikaḥ uttari diratta tirattam sahaseyyam kappeti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Anupasampanne upasampannasaññī uttaridirattatirattaṁ sahaseyyaṁ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: an upasampanne upasampanna saññī uttari diratta tirattam sahaseyyam kappeti āpatti pācittiyassa
upaḍḍha channe upaḍḍha paricchanne āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: dve rattiyo vasitvā tatiyāya rattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasati,
analyzed: dve rattiyaḥ vasitvā tatiyāya rattiyā purā aruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasati
